biography: Joni, a familiar name at the Hill Side Golf Club, is known for his reserved demeanor off the course, but his intense focus during competition is legendary. Although he is widely considered to be retired, his impact on the Hector Trophée is undeniable.

Joni has made one appearance at the Hector Trophée, winning the tournament on that occasion. While he has never lifted the Victor Trophy, his contributions to the team format have been invaluable. It is always possible that he will come out of retirement.
While Joni is not expected to participate in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, fans will fondly remember his past performances and hope for a possible return to the competition in the future.
